titles:
Food for thought:
What if money was designed to get you more over time, not less?
#Bitcoin

To celebrate the fourth halving, we’re giving away 1 #Bitcoin each week between now and May 20th.

First drawing is on May 9th.

Here’s how to enter ↓
http://coinbase.com/bitcoin-halving-giveaway…

No purchase necessary. US (excluding HI), CA (excluding QC), IRE, GER, and FR only. Void where prohibited. Ends 5/20/2024.

Rules: http://coinbase.com/bitcoin-halving-giveaway/rules…

The fourth #Bitcoin halving is almost here.
And a proper thank you is in order to the ones impacted the most.

So, to the miners…thank you for moving money forward.

We're excited to welcome 
@VitalikButerin
 as keynote speaker of this year's Machine Learning and Blockchain Research Summit.

Register now to join us virtually on 5.2 and connect with leading experts from the blockchain and AI industries.

→ http://coinbase.com/ml-bc-summit

Our Break The Cycle ad is nominated for a #Webby.
It struck a nerve with people inside and outside this space who all want a better system.

A vote for this ad is a vote for just that—a better system.

Vote here → https://vote.webbyawards.com/PublicVoting#/2024/advertising-media-pr/advertising-campaigns/best-video-campaign…

Maybe next year's voting can be onchain.

Good news. 

We are now registered as a Restricted Dealer in Canada, making us the first international and largest exchange registered there.

Learn more: http://coinbase.com/blog/coinbase-obtains-registration-as-a-restricted-dealer-in-canada…

Millions of Canadians own digital assets.
86% of them believe the financial system needs an update.

Registration is the latest step in doing just that.

Regulation is critical. 29% of non-crypto owners said they'd buy if there were more industry regulation.

We’re committed to continuing our work with Canadian policymakers and regulators to make Canada a leader in the global crypto economy.

The future of money is here.

Over 300 guests including builders and policymakers attended the #UpdateTheSystem summit in DC.

Thanks to all who attended to discuss how crypto and onchain technology are helping move money, and America, forward.

Buying 
@girlscouts
 cookies with USDC on Base.

Just another onchain use case.
Good morning.

If you’re in DC come check out 
@CompassCoffeeDC
 - you can pay with crypto (zero fees paying with USDC on Base), and get a free can of coffee if you mint their NFT.

1201 Half St SE, Washington, DC 20003

Shout out to 
@slice__so
 for hosting the Point of Sale software  and

You voted with your wallets.
This design was minted the most. (good choice)

Catch it on the shelves in stores all over the country this summer.

And prepare to scan for Onchain Vision.

For 5+ years, the industry's been hard at work building the infrastructure to update the financial system.

Today, the use cases for crypto are no longer future promises. They're already here.

→ http://coinbase.com/blog/what-is-crypto-good-for-anyway…

Crypto moves America forward.
The future is being built today. Will policy keep pace?

Join us on 3.20 for the #UpdateTheSystem Summit in DC, where industry leaders will discuss the pivotal role that policy plays in shaping American innovation.

RSVP → http://updatethesystemsummit.splashthat.com

Speaking of unnecessary fees, U.S. consumers paid an estimated $75 billion in credit card transaction fees in 2022 alone.

So it's not surprising that 7 in 10 want lower fees as part of an updated financial system.

Here’s how crypto can help ↓ 
https://coinbase.com/blog/saving-greater-than-usd74-billion-as-a-start-how-crypto-makes-everyday… #SOTU2024

This isn't just any Tuesday. It's Super Tuesday.
The day when 21 million crypto holders can vote.

If you #StandWithCrypto, it’s time to make your voice heard.
Because what happens today, matters in November.

http://standwithcrypto.org/vote

Today was historic at the first-ever pro-crypto rally.

Special thanks to 
@Nas
 and to everyone who joined us in LA to contribute to the conversation.

Reminder: Vote tomorrow, Super Tues.

Because what happens tomorrow, matters in Nov. #StandWithCrypto
https://standwithcrypto.org/vote

Alabama stands with crypto.

18% of voting-age Alabamans own digital assets.
And they care about where candidates stand on crypto.

Read on ↓
https://coinbase.com/blog/alabama-voters-stand-with-crypto…

Can you work at the speed of crypto?

Join our Coinbase Product Manager Challenge and you could score ETH, an NFT, and a call with a recruiter.

Submit now through 3/13 → http://coinbase.com/bounty #livecrypto

It's time to #StandWithCrypto in LA.

Join the first pro-crypto rally in history the evening before Super Tuesday. There will be food, drinks, panel discussions, and a live performance by 
@Nas
.

RSVP here: http://cryptovotes.splashthat.com

We are aware that some users may see a zero balance across their Coinbase accounts & may experience errors in buying or selling. Our team is investigating this & will provide an update shortly. Your assets are safe.
You can track this incident at http://status.coinbase.com

21 million crypto holders can vote on Super Tuesday—and it’s one week away.

Vote on Tuesday, March 5.
http://standwithcrypto.org/vote
#StandWithCrypto

Our asset recovery tool just got an update.

Starting today, users can now recover funds mistakenly sent to Coinbase on BNB Smart Chain and Polygon.
Learn more:

We're thrilled to welcome 
@ComeProst
 as the new Coinbase Country Lead for France. 

His expertise will undoubtedly elevate our presence in the French crypto landscape. 

Bienvenue à bord, Côme.

The Lone Star State stands with crypto.

4.7 million voting-age Texans own digital assets.
And they care about where candidates stand on crypto.
Read on → https://coinbase.com/blog/texas-voters-stand-with-crypto…

March 5th is Super Tuesday, when 21 million crypto holders in 14 states can make their voices heard. 

If you  crypto, show your love for it today by making sure you're registered to vote. Because what happens in March matters in November. #StandWithCrypto #ValentinesDay
Register here:

2/3 of the pennies made don’t circulate.
Meanwhile, there were 9 trillion dollars worth of stablecoin transactions in 2022.

The future of money is already here.

Honest Abe has made it onchain.

To celebrate how stablecoins make pennies useful again, mint a penny NFT and get a penny hat for the low low price of .01¢ plus shipping — while supplies last.

http://MintAPenny.xyz

The penny…
$1.2 million worth of them go missing every year.
It costs nearly 3x the value of one just to make one.
And it’s been 167 years since its last update.

Thankfully, crypto can move the penny forward.
Right, Abe?
